summary: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.
cast: Jon Lovitz|Timothy Stack|Timothy E. Day|Thurl Ravenscroft|Deanna Oliver|Phil Hartman|Joe Ranft|Judy Toll|Wayne Kaatz|Colette Savage|Mindy Sterling|Jim Jackman|Randall William Cook|Randy Bennett|Jonathan Benair|Louis Conti|Beth Anderson|Pat Ericson|Gary Falcone|Roger Freeland|Janis Liebhart|Darryl Phinnessee|Joe Pizzulo|Newell Alexander|Rosemary Alexander|Susie Allanson|Wayne Allwine|Steve Alterman|Tom Amundsen|Tony Anselmo|Stephen Apostolina|Kirk Baily|Greg Berg|Mary Kay Bergman|Steve Bulen|Mitch Carter|Nancy Cartwright|Robert Clotworthy|David Cowgill|Holly Dorff|Terri Douglas|Chris Edgerly|Pat Fraley|Eddie Frierson|Donald Fullilove|Elisa Gabrielli|Jackie Gonneau|Nicholas Guest|Archie Hahn|Jason Harris|Bridget Hoffman|Mona Marshall|Scott Menville|Edie Mirman|Jonathan Nichols|Paul Pape|Patrick Pinney|Phil Proctor|Jerry Rees|Peter Renaday|Pepper Sweeney
title: La tostadora valiente
